mapper.sql: id, tenderer_id, certification_id, certification_name, certification_content, expire_time, applicable_region, certification_no
mapper.insert:
insert into t_qyzz_biddee_certification
id,
tenderer_id,
certification_id,
certification_name,
certification_content,
expire_time,
applicable_region,
certification_no,

mapper.update: update t_qyzz_biddee_certification a INNER JOIN t_qyzz_biddee_certification_certification b ON a.id = b.id set a.tenderer_id = b.biddee_apply_id, a.certification_id = b.certification_id, a.certification_name = b.certification_name, a.certification_content = b.certification_content, a.expire_time = b.expire_time, a.applicable_region = b.applicable_region, a.certification_no = b.certification_no where b.biddee_apply_id = #{biddeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_qyzz_biddee_certification
tenderer_id = #{tendererId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
certification_id = #{certificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
certification_name = #{certificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certification_content = #{certificationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE},
applicable_region = #{applicableRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certification_no = #{certificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_qyzz_biddee_certification set tenderer_id = #{tendererId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, certification_id = #{certificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, certification_name = #{certificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification_content = #{certificationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE}, applicable_region = #{applicableRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification_no = #{certificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
